creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: blocky black and white image divided in three parts; abstracted figure at R holding staff; village in center band with figures in front buildings, two of whom are holding a smelting pot; at bottom, figures fill pots, carve, and open molds; at top, a man pulls a cart at R; figures seated in building with vessels UL
inscription:
at top: 問屋
in center: 一、河内　丹南　鋳物の　起り　ヤガエフ　今ぢや　高岡　金屋町
at bottom, from right: 型起し　型干場
portfolio: From Ironmonger's Marching Song (Yagaefu やがえ節)
title: First song (part 3)
